targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "ceph_perf_osd_op_wip" WHERE "cluster" =~ /$cluster/ AND "osd" =~ /$osd/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT derivative(first(value),1s) FROM "ceph_perf_osd_op" WHERE "cluster" =~ /$cluster/ AND "osd" =~ /$osd/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)

list.name: cluster
list.query: show tag values from ceph_health with key = cluster

list.name: osd
list.query: show tag values from ceph_perf_osd_op_latency with key = osd
